vote.title: Authorize (1) an emergency Nonprofit Assistance Program (Program) (Exhibit A) to provide financial support in the form of a grant for operational expenses, including, but not limited to rent, utilities, staff salaries and benefits, cleaning supplies, and programs supplies incurred between July 1, 2020 and December 14, 2020, and resulting from COVID-19 and/or in response to needs caused by the pandemic, to Dallas-based nonprofit organizations that deliver social service programming; and (2) execution of all documents and agreements necessary to implement the Program, including but not limited to subrecipient agreement(s) to administer the Program through an open application process - Not to exceed $550,000.00 - Financing: U.S. Department of Treasury - Coronavirus Relief Funds
vote.description: Authorize (1) an emergency Nonprofit Assistance Program (Program) (Exhibit A) to provide financial support in the form of a grant for operational expenses, including, but not limited to rent, utilities, staff salaries and benefits, cleaning supplies, and programs supplies incurred between July 1, 2020 and December 14, 2020, and resulting from COVID-19 and/or in response to needs caused by the pandemic, to Dallas-based nonprofit organizations that deliver social service programming; and (2) execution of all documents and agreements necessary to implement the Program, including but not limited to subrecipient agreement(s) to administer the Program through an open application process - Not to exceed $550,000.00 - Financing: U.S. Department of Treasury - Coronavirus Relief Funds
